channel.title: CVE Feed for PostgreSQL -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PostgreSQL -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-7546|2024-09-16T17:18:53.123Z -- postgresql -- postgresql
item.description: PostgreSQL versions before 9.2.22, 9.3.18, 9.4.13, 9.5.8 and 9.6.4 are vulnerable to incorrect authentication flaw allowing remote attackers to gain access to database accounts with an empty password.

item.title: CVE-2017-7548|2024-09-16T16:18:38.892Z -- postgresql -- postgresql
item.description: PostgreSQL versions before 9.4.13, 9.5.8 and 9.6.4 are vulnerable to authorization flaw allowing remote authenticated attackers with no privileges on a large object to overwrite the entire contents of the object, resulting in a denial of service.
